reviews.text: Looks dark brown, smells like espresso and coffee beans, taste like coffee and with strong bitterness. Great beer and strong beer.

Taster at the brewery in downtown TorontoAppearance: amber, clear, medium foamAroma: malty, not a lot of aromaTaste: low bitternessFeel: tartOverall: good beer, one of the pilsen I appreciate, very refreshingDrank: 8/17/2016 2:00PM

Glass from tap at the brewery in Monroe, Washingtonamber, slightly clear, small size foamvery fragrant, hoppymedium bitterness, slightly sweet, lacks depthmedium carbonation, abrupt finishgood beer; repeat: yes; look for: Nodrank: November 20, 20167:03 PM
